english.segment1: Anchor up, tow me out of this pit I'm dreading. Turn this vessel's path around. I look above, I'm in love. With the pace you're setting. From this stream we're ocean bound
english.segment2: Chorus. And I know for sure I'm headed straight for the edge. And I know for sure I'm headed straight for the edge. 'Cause that's just where You are
english.segment3: I'm the son, you're the King. Makes me royalty now. It's no title without pain. In the end it is well. After storms and beatings. These muddy rivers empty out
